I stand before you today as a testament to resilience and adaptability. Throughout this game, I've demonstrated my ability to form meaningful connections, navigate complex dynamics, and make strategic decisions. I've earned my place in the final two through hard work and dedication.

In contrast, my opponent has relied on manipulation and opportunism to advance. They've consistently prioritized their own interests over the well-being of others, leaving a trail of burned bridges in their wake.

I urge you to consider the character and integrity of each finalist. Who do you want to reward with the win? Someone who has played with honesty and heart, or someone who has exploited and deceived others to get ahead?

I'm proud of the relationships I've built and the way I've conducted myself in this game. I believe I deserve to win, not just because of my gameplay, but because of the values I've upheld throughout.

Thank you for your consideration.
